history.text: Hi
Batman v Superman was a trainwreck of movie
Did you like it?
Hi ... yes, I liked it a lot
Really
what did you like about it
although Rotten Tomatoes did not seem like that
I thought the casting was pretty good
I feel that the cast was the right one, and Ben is the best batman I've seen since Adam West
Well rotten tomatoes doesn't have an agenda all they do is aggregate critical reviews. Critics didn't like it
The direction was a miss and the script was really uneven
There were moments I really wanted the film to work, but it just didnt have any pacing or focus The scenes ripped straight from Dark Knight Returns comic book were good
Yes, I feel that it was good, but it had many empty arguments, the direction of Zack Snyder was not the best
but only if you had the benefit of reading the book for context
I had high hopes for it. I love DC comics but the movies have been really weak.
Batman V Superman is no exception
If you're right, the only thing I rescue is Ben Affleck ... the worst thing for me was lex, for a second I thought it was the joker.
Yea that was just terrible direction
I think Zack snyder was just mad they didnt let him use the actual joker for his movie
so he just made lex luthor the joker which is terrible because they are literally polar opposites as characters.
And transforming Zod into Doomsday was just a waste of both charaters
Exactly, I've always known that you have to know how to accept comics in movies, but that lex crearaa doomsday does not seem right
Yea I mean Doomsday has never been about backstory but of all things hes supposed to be alien.
and the way in which superman has differences with batman is not the best explained, it's almost for no reason
Lex creates Bizaro in some stories
for a few seconds I thought it would be bizarre when Zod was transforming, but of course the trailer knew that it could not be
Yea which was a shame
For me Batman v Superman was just a story of missed opportunities. Which is why I really didn't like it.
For me it felt like it was directed by somebody who hated all the characters it was based on.
And what do you think of "Marta" ?? for me that was the worst argument in the movie
Ugh Hated it
such a thin reason for him to suddenly have a change of heart
the best friends after "Martha", he forgot that he destroyed cities and could be a danger to humanity hahaha
real weak
I wanted this movie to work so bad
enjoy the fights, the batman vs superman was something epic, as a fan of the comics I liked, but the story was the problem
Even Batmans motivation for attacking Superman was really thin. They had to stretch the plot out alot to justify it. Lex's whole plan with turning them against each other was so bad
As always Zack Snyder delivered on the visuals during the fight scenes
but there was just no emotional weight behind him you didn't believe in the reason they were fighting
it was just such a missed opportunity.

Another scene that I did not understand was when Lex says that aliens will come, how did he know ??? , although we saw a deleted scene that talks with Steppenwolf, but that scene did not go out worldwide
Yea just another example of how the script was a mess. The whole exposition at the end just trying to set up the Justice League as well was really forced.
I could have done without that interrupting the pacing of the funeral sequences.
If accurate, where did they get that they called themselves metahumans? Where did Lex get the logos of each hero? LOL
Yea it relies heavily on audiences prior knowledge.
which I get you have to do to a certain extent
but likes it runs counter to what the rest of the film is trying to say
Yes, and in the end you know why the earth was raised on the coffin ???
because I do not know
Because thats what it looked like in the comics
literally the only reason
another scene without meaning, because that has nothing to do with what we saw in justice league
Zack Snyder isn't a good writer he was just stealing from other writers without any idea of what he was taking and why.
Overall I disliked the film, and I hope in the future we are given a better DC universe.
It can be, since his other dc movies were not to my liking either

B
ro was a pleasure to have this talk with you, it was very entertaining as we shared the same points of view, thank you very much ... as a fan we just have to enjoy it with your problems and everything was something unique

uid2response.feedback: all great, my partner was very pleasant when answering
